Submodules¶

mfm.common module¶

common.py

Common data for all scripts in the SuRF-toolbox. In the common library all kinds of constants are defined. For instance colors in plots but also constants as the Avogadros number.

mfm.common.CHARGE_DICT = {u'CYS': -1.0, u'ASP': -1.0, u'CTERM': -1.0, u'NTERM': 1.0, u'LYS': 1.0, u'HIS': 1.0, u'ARG': 1.0, u'GLU': -1.0, u'TYR': -1.0}¶

Default charges of amino acids

mfm.common.MAX_BONDS = {u'H': 1, u'C': 4, u'P': 5, u'O': 3, u'N': 4}¶

Dictionary of maximum number of bonds per atom type

mfm.common.MW_DICT = {u'ILE': 131.17, u'GLN': 146.15, u'GLX': 146.64, u'GLY': 75.07, u'GLU': 147.13, u'CYS': 121.15, u'HIS': 155.16, u'SER': 105.09, u'LYS': 146.19, u'PRO': 115.13, u'ASX': 132.61, u'ASN': 132.12, u'STA': 157.15, u'VAL': 117.15, u'THR': 119.12, u'ASP': 133.1, u'TRP': 204.23, u'IVA': 85.12, u'PHE': 165.19, u'ALA': 89.09, u'MET': 149.21, u'ACE': 43.3, u'LEU': 131.17, u'ARG': 174.2, u'TYR': 181.19}¶

Dictionary of amino acid molecular weights. The the molecular weight of water should be subtracted for each peptide bond to calculate a protein molecular weight.

mfm.common.MW_H2O = 18.0¶

Molecular weight of water

mfm.common.PKA_DICT = {u'CYS': 8.5, u'ASP': 4.0, u'CTERM': 3.1, u'NTERM': 8.0, u'LYS': 10.4, u'HIS': 6.5, u'ARG': 12.0, u'GLU': 4.4, u'TYR': 10.0}¶

Dictionary of pKa values and un-protonated charge state.

mfm.common.TITR_ATOM = {u'ASP': u'CG ', u'LYS': u'NZ ', u'HIS': u'NE2', u'ARG': u'CZ ', u'GLU': u'CD ', u'TYR': u'OH '}¶

Atom on which to place charge in amino-acid

mfm.common.TITR_ATOM_COARSE = {u'CYS': u'CB', u'ASP': u'CB', u'LYS': u'CB', u'HIS': u'CB', u'ARG': u'CB', u'GLU': u'CB', u'TYR': u'CB'}¶

Atom on which to place charge in amino-acid (Coarse grained default position C-Beta)

class mfm.curve.DataCurve(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: mfm.curve.Curve, mfm.curve.ExperimentalData

dt¶

The derivative of x. If the derivative is constant (often the case in measured data) only the first element is returned.
